item.description:
The 2009-10 ski season is almost underway! Get ready for the snow by attending the AMC Ski Committee Open House on Wed. Dec 2 from 7 p.m. to 10 p.m. at 5 Joy St., Boston, MA 02108. The doors open at 7:00 and we'll have gear, discussion, a slide show, light refreshments, and more.

- Advice about cross country, backcountry, telemark, randonee and alpine gear and trip planning
- Information about workshops and trips offered by the Ski Committee
- Slide show presentation about backcountry skiing in Hokkaido Japan
- Door Prize raffle for Mad River Glen lift tickets, Weston Ski passes, and a pair of Silvretta Pure randonee bindings

Please join us and start the season right!

Questions? Contact David Metsky (amc_metsky at yahoo. com). No need to RSVP, just show up and enjoy.

For more information:

Appalachian Mountain Club Web site: www.outdoors.org
Boston Chapter Ski Committee: www.amcboston.org/ski/index.html
To join the Boston Chapter mail list for future events: http://groups.yahoo.c...

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: AMC Ski Committee Open House
